summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 ISATA (NA).  ON JULY 18, 2007, THE CONTACT FILLED THE PROPANE AND FUEL TANKS DUE TO A POWER OUTAGE.  AN ELECTRICIAN INSPECTED THE CONNECTIONS TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYTHING WAS WORKING PROPERLY.  THE VEHICLE WAS LEFT UNATTENDED FOR A DAY AND, WHEN THE CONTACT RETURNED, HE FOUND ONLY THE FRAME REMAINING.  THE VEHICLE CAUGHT FIRE AND WAS DESTROYED.  A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED.  THE PURCHASE DATE WAS UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 82,000.  UPDATED 01/09/08.  *LJ  UPDATED 12/12/07  *TR
